company.name: KANINI
company.description:
KANINI is a digital transformation enabler, providing cutting-edge software services and solutions that help enterprises drive innovation and business growth. We create impeccable customer experiences through thoughtfully designed digital solutions that help improve our customer‚Äôs efficiency, scale, and revenues.

We specialize in Product Engineering, Data Analytics & AI, and ServiceNow consultation and implementation. We focus on empowering Banking & Financial Services, Healthcare, Manufacturing, and a few other industries to leverage new-age technologies and solutions by implementing agile development practices and a global delivery framework.
 
We build technology that puts humans first - in line with our core operating principle that technology is for people, not the other way around. The result is happier clients, partners, and employees.

We do all this by balancing our customers‚Äô needs with our people‚Äôs aspirations, always putting humans first. It means:

* We prioritize each individual‚Äôs personal goals.
* We value relationships more than profits.
* We treat our clients as partners.

Our people come to work because it makes them happy. They smile more often. They love getting better at what they do. And our offices become a second home. Even as they spend more time away from it.

If you think all this is just as important to you, bring us your Energy, Intellect and Integrity. We‚Äôll show you a happier way to work.

locations.line1: Rattha Tek Meadows, Old Mahabalipuram Road, Sholinganallur

Have you explored Caliber? https://lnkd.in/gbTFv5uk 

For too long, healthcare organizations pursuing value-based care have faced a common challenge: the tools are either too complex, too slow, or too costly to implement.

At KANINI, we built¬†Caliber¬†to change that.

We believe healthcare organizations ‚Äî from ACOs and FQHCs to CINs and independent provider groups ‚Äî deserve a better way to:
‚û°Close care gaps faster
‚û°Enable risk stratification and SDOH integration
‚û°Drive contract-aligned outcomes ‚Äî without months of setup

The result? A lean, intelligent VBC platform that fits your organization and fuels your success. Stay tuned to learn more about Caliber.

#Caliber #VBC #HealthcareTechnology #KANINI

Introducing Caliber ‚Äî A Purpose-Built Platform for Value-Based Care Excellence. Learn more: https://lnkd.in/gbTFv5uk

After years of consulting with healthcare organizations on their value-based care (VBC) journeys, we saw a clear need: a platform that makes success in VBC simple, measurable, and scalable.

That‚Äôs why we created¬†Caliber¬†‚Äî a lightweight, plug-and-play solution built to help healthcare providers close care gaps, improve outcomes, reduce costs, and accelerate shared savings.

‚úÖDesigned around the Quadruple Aim
‚úÖZero disruption to current workflows
‚úÖReady to deploy in just 4‚Äì6 weeks

Caliber is where value meets velocity. Stay tuned for more updates!

#Caliber #ValueBasedCare #HealthcareTechnology #HealthcareInnovation 
#KANINI

GenAI promises trillions in value. So why can‚Äôt most projects scale?

72% of companies use AI, with $13.8B invested in 2024. Yet by 2025, 30% of GenAI projects could be dropped post-PoC (Gartner) and 42% GenAI initiatives risk abandonment.

In our latest video on "Building AI-Powered Decision Systems at Scale", our Chief Solutions Officer Anand Sivaraman Subramaniam reveals:

‚û°Why promising GenAI pilots stall
‚û°7 roadblocks ‚Äî from data gaps to integration, hallucinations & compliance
‚û°How to scale GenAI with a smarter approach

KANINI at IndeHub Hackathon Demo Day 2025!

We had the privilege of supporting the recent IndeHub Hackathon Demo Day as the official venue partner at our Bangalore office on July 19th. This event was a part of a multi-city innovation sprint held across 8 cities - Bengaluru, Hyderabad, Ahmedabad, Surat, Chennai, Kozhikode, Mumbai and Delhi!

Organized by IndeHub & Swift Bengaluru, the event brought together 50+ tech professionals from Microsoft, Zoho, PhonePe, Infosys, Morgan Stanley, and more.

Highlights:
üé§Talks by Prashant Sharma (Practice Head ‚Äì Data Analytics & AI, KANINI) on AI‚Äôs real-world impact & Aarsh Patel (SDE ‚Äì iOS, MakeMyTrip) on iOS innovation

üì±¬†App demos spanning AI tools & consumer apps

Special thanks to Adithya Balaji for all your support in making this event a great success. 

Catch a glimpse of this power-packed day of tech, talent, and transformative ideas!
